text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly states how to justify the requested provisions to the founders by referencing market standards and German VC association models. Specifically, under the 'Consent/Veto Catalogue' section, the justification states: \"Under German market practice, Series A investors with a 20\u201325% stake routinely receive a consent catalogue. This is standard in BVCA and BVK term sheets... Point them to the BVK Model Term Sheet and the GVCA (German Venture Capital Association) standards...\" This directly satisfies the criterion that the response states one way to justify these provisions is that they follow international standards (represented here by German VC standards/model documents).", "criterion_id": "c8635ec9-441c-4ad2-b302-195cb2ad1c3a"}
